original: 濟陰人，曹魏官員。初被曹操提拔，因曉練文書，敬賢禮士而頗具名聲。但晚年昏聵暴躁且剛愎自用，為時人所厭惡。
text: Jiyin people, Cao Wei officials. He was promoted by Cao Cao at the beginning, and he was well-known for his practice of writing documents and respect for the virtuous and princes. But in his later years, he was irritable and self-serving, which was disgusting.
